body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Collins Motors customer support. My name is Edward Collins. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's nice to meet you, Crystal. To assist you further, could you please provide me with your phone number and email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, one two three, four five six seven. And my email address is crystalcarter@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Crystal. We take security seriously, which is why we ask for these details. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling confused about the security measures in place at the dealership. Can you clarify them for me?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course, Crystal. Our security measures include access control systems, surveillance cameras, and regular security audits. Your safety is our top priority.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That's reassuring to hear. Thank you for explaining, Edward.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Crystal. If you have any more questions or concerns, feel free to reach out. Thank you for your time today. Have a great day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Edward. You have a great day too!
